news.topic: 12:24新盤全面睇｜啟德維港‧灣畔會所連園林面積逾12萬呎 設50米長峇里園林戶外泳池

news.topic: 11:19H按情報｜1個月拆息今報0.93厘 較對上一個交易日跌6點子 (8月4日更新)
news.summary: The article discusses the current Hong Kong Interbank Offered Rate (HIBOR) trends, noting a decrease in the 1-month HIBOR to 0.93%, which affects mortgage rates. It compares HIBOR-linked mortgage rates (H按) with prime rate-based mortgages (P按) and provides examples of monthly repayments for a HK$4 million loan over 25 years.
news.validation_reason: The content focuses on mortgage rate trends and financial analysis rather than specific property transactions.

news.topic: 10:00分析｜名門7個月炒貴428萬 豪宅真是咁好炒？
